meaningMnemonic: You must <kanji>respond</kanji> with <kanji>aid</kanji> in order to show your <vocabulary>support</vocabulary> for someone who needs it. You can usually show your support if you <vocabulary>root for</vocabulary> them.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
